Class Card

java.lang.Object
Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionCard, NormalCard
public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
this a super class for any kind of card inside this game abstract things about every card is written inside this class, including type, color and score
Version:
1.0 (30.4.2021)
Author:
mohammad-hossein zeynal zadeh

    private java.lang.String cardColor
    this field represents color of card including: blue, red, green and black
    private int score
    represents score of cards
    private java.lang.String type
    this field represents type of card types are including: A, B, C, D, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 and 10
